pageProps.title: My tools
pageProps.content:
#### 1. Personal productivity
[Things 3](https://culturedcode.com/things), [Google calendar](https://calendar.google.com)

#### 2. Team productivity
[Slack](https://slack.com)

#### 3. Notes
[Workflowy](https://blog.workflowy.com)

#### 4. Programming languages
Right now: [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/intro.html) and [PHP](https://www.php.net/manual/en).

Previously: [Clojure](https://clojure.org/), [JavaScript](https://262.ecma-international.org/12.0), [C#](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp), and [C++](https://isocpp.org).

#### 5. Development
[WebStorm](https://www.jetbrains.com/webstorm)/[PhpStorm](https://www.jetbrains.com/phpstorm)/[NeoVim](https://neovim.io), [iterm2](https://iterm2.com).

#### 6. Backend
[Nest.js](https://docs.nestjs.com), [Symfony](https://symfony.com/doc/6.2/the-fast-track/en/index.html), [Postgres](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/index.html), [Redis](https://redis.io/documentation), and [Elasticsearch](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/index.html).

#### 7. Operations
[Kubernetes](https://kubernetes.io/docs/home), [Helm](https://helm.sh/docs), [AWS](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/concepts.html), and [GitHub Actions](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/guides/about-continuous-integration).

#### 8. Testing
[Jest](https://jestjs.io/docs/api) and [PHPUnit](https://docs.phpunit.de/en/10.5).
